product_name: Yakima SkyBox 18 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box
long_description: Ideal for hauling gear for 4 campers, the Yakima SkyBox 18 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box features a dimple-textured lid that reduces drag, resulting in less noise and more stability. And it looks great!
short_description: Ideal for hauling gear for 4 campers, the Yakima SkyBox 18 Carbonite Cargo Roof Box features a dimple-textured lid that reduces drag, resulting in less noise and more stability. And it looks great!
